Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Increases transparency in ticket reselling marketplaces
Summary: Increases transparency in ticket reselling marketplaces by requiring ticket resellers have accounts which show their name and a photo of them.
LawCode: Amd ยง25.23, Arts & Cul L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to increasing transparency in ticket reselling marketplaces
